text:
LiveStories | Software Engineers, Data Scientists, Data Engineers | Seattle | Onsite | Full-time | https://www.livestories.com

LiveStories drives outreach and better decisions using civic data—how communities live, learn, work, and play. Our all-in-one data platform makes it easy to analyze local data, get benchmarks, and create interactive stories.

Our stack is mostly Javascript (Node and React). We’re hiring software engineers (frontend, backend, full-stack), data engineers, and data scientists.

For more information, email me at jake@livestories.com or check out https://www.livestories.com/careers
